QuestData.Title: Return to the Greatmother
QuestData.Description: Return to Greatmother Geyah at Garadar with news of your victory, $n. This will surely lift the spirits of the Mag'har. Perhaps even the young Hellscream will be lifted from his malaise.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Garadar and speak to Greatmother Geyah.
QuestData.RewardText: I want you to personally deliver this news to Garrosh.
